user_query: I'm planning a movie night with friends and I want to create a fun atmosphere. Can you fetch some trending memes from Reddit to share and laugh together? Additionally, it would be great if you could provide me with some interesting data from Midknightt API to discuss during the movie.

TaskList.description: Fetch trending memes from Reddit to share during the movie night.
Fetch interesting data from Midknightt API to discuss during the movie.
